# Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js website for a German Garten & Landschaftsbau (landscaping) company.

## Design Guidelines
- Clean, minimal design inspired by German industrial aesthetics
- Big, bold headings with minimal text
- No shadows, gradients, or light effects
- Limited color palette - primarily neutral colors with one accent color
- Modern but professional look
- Mobile-responsive design

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React components

## Code Style
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Functional React components with hooks
- Tailwind CSS for all styling
- German language content
